abstract: Tumbleweed season has begun in Kansas; although the bushy plants will again cause residents some annoyance, their numbers will be reduced due to the drought in the southwest of the state.
snippet: The mascot of the middle of nowhere, tumbleweeds are on the move once again. But the drought in southwest Kansas may mean fewer tumbleweeds than in years past.
lead_paragraph: The mascot of the middle of nowhere, tumbleweeds are on the move once again. But the drought in southwest Kansas may mean fewer tumbleweeds than in years past.

headline.main: Drifting Along, Tumbleweeds Are Piling Up Across Plains
headline.print_headline: Drifting Along, Tumbleweeds Are Piling Up Across Plains
headline.seo: Tumbleweeds Are Piling Up Across the Plains
